social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: Dr. Ambedkar Centrally Sponsored Scheme of Post-Matric Scholarships for the Economically Backward Class (EBC) Students
social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.ministry: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment
social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.department: Department of Social Justice and Empowerment
objectives: Provide financial assistance to Economically Backward Class (EBC) students
Enable EBC students to complete post-matriculation or post-secondary education

benefits.scholarship: Financial assistance for studies in India

eligibility_criteria: Pursuing post-matriculation or post-secondary education in India

application_process.mode: Online/Offline (via respective state portals or institutions)
steps: Apply through the National Scholarship Portal or state scholarship portal
Verification by educational institution and scholarship authorities

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: Jeevanam Self-Employment Scheme To Dependents Of Crime Victims
objectives: Provide financial assistance for self-employment to dependents of crime victims
Support economic independence for affected families
eligibility_criteria: Breadwinner of the family affected by crime

steps: Obtain application form from Department of Social Justice

documents_required: Document proving dependency on crime victim

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: Coaching Schemes For SC/ST/OBC (Non-Creamy Layer) & Minority Students For Universities
objectives: Provide coaching to SC/ST/OBC (non-creamy layer) and minority students
Support preparation for university entrance examinations

benefits.coaching: Free or subsidized coaching for higher education entrance

eligibility_criteria: Belong to SC, ST, OBC (non-creamy layer), or minority communities

steps: Apply through designated coaching institutes or Ministry portal
Selection based on merit or need

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: Goa Village & Municipal Child Committee Grants And Awards Scheme
social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.department: Department of Women and Child Development
objectives: Support Panchayats/Municipal bodies in addressing child-related issues
Promote child welfare activities at the local level
eligibility_criteria: Panchayats or Municipal Local Bodies in Goa

steps: Submit application to Department of Women and Child Development
Provide details of child welfare activities

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: Fee Waiver Scheme For SC/ST Students Pursuing Higher Education
objectives: Provide free access to higher education for SC/ST students
Ensure no eligible SC/ST student is deprived of education due to financial constraints

benefits.fee_waiver: Full waiver of tuition fees for higher education

eligibility_criteria: Enrolled in recognized higher education institution

steps: Apply through educational institution or Department of Tribal Welfare

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana
objectives: Provide life insurance cover for death due to any reason
Offer renewable one-year life insurance coverage

benefits.insurance_cover: ₹2,00,000 for death due to any reason

eligibility_criteria: Must have a bank/post office account

steps: Approach participating bank or post office
Submit consent form and premium payment

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: Financial Assistance For Purchase Of Stationery To SC/ST/OBC/Minorities Students
social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.department: Department for the Welfare of SC/ST/OBC/Minorities
objectives: Provide financial assistance for purchasing stationery
Support SC/ST/OBC/Minority students in classes 1 to 12
eligibility_criteria: Studying in Govt. of India/GNCT of Delhi/Aided Recognized schools

steps: Apply through school or Department for the Welfare of SC/ST/OBC/Minorities

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act
objectives: Provide at least 100 days of guaranteed wage employment
Support rural households with unskilled work opportunities

benefits.employment: Minimum 100 days of wage employment per financial year

eligibility_criteria: Willing to do unskilled manual work

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: Dr. B.R. Ambedkar Awas Navinikarn Yojna
social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.department: Department of Social Justice and Empowerment
objectives: Provide grants for house repairs to Below Poverty Line families
Support Scheduled Caste and backward class families
eligibility_criteria: Belong to Below Poverty Line, Scheduled Caste, or Backward Classes

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: The Artist Welfare Fund Of Assam
objectives: Provide financial assistance to artists
Support medical aid, education, and accident relief for artists

benefits.financial_assistance: Support for medical, educational, and accident-related expenses

steps: Apply through Assam State Film (Finance and Development) Corporation

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: State Programme For Rehabilitation Of Persons With Disabilities
social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.department: Department of Social Justice, Empowerment and Tribal Affairs
objectives: Provide rehabilitation services to persons with disabilities
Support under the Persons with Disabilities Act 1995

benefits.rehabilitation: Aids and rehabilitation services for disabled persons

eligibility_criteria: Person with disability as per the 1995 Act

steps: Apply through Department of Social Justice

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: Grant of House Construction Subsidy to Scheduled Caste People
objectives: Provide house construction subsidy to poor Scheduled Caste people
Support economically backward classes
eligibility_criteria: Belong to Scheduled Caste or economically backward class

steps: Apply through Adi Dravidar Welfare Department

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: Financial Assistance for Marriage of Poor Scheduled Caste Brides
objectives: Provide financial assistance for marriage of poor SC brides
Support poor Scheduled Caste parents

steps: Apply through Adi Dravidar Welfare Department

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: Pension to the Persons who lost 100% Eye Sight
social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.department: Directorate of Social Welfare and Social Education
objectives: Provide monthly pension to persons with 100% blindness
Support financial independence for visually impaired individuals

steps: Apply through Directorate of Social Welfare

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: Leprosy Pension Scheme
social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.department: Department of Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities
objectives: Provide financial assistance to persons affected by leprosy
Support social welfare and empowerment

steps: Apply through Department of Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: Death Benefit Scheme (APB&OCWWB)
objectives: Provide financial assistance to families of deceased registered workers
Support construction workers' welfare

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: HIV / AIDS Pension Scheme
objectives: Provide monthly financial assistance to HIV/AIDS-affected persons
Support personal and medical expenses

steps: Apply through Department of Social Welfare

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: National Action Plan for Skill Development of Persons with Disabilities
social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.ministry: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment
social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.department: Department of Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities
objectives: Provide vocational training to Persons with Disabilities (PwDs)
Enhance employability and societal contribution
eligibility_criteria: Person with Disability as per government norms

steps: Apply through designated training institutes or DEPwD portal

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: Swasraya Scheme For Parents/Mothers Of Physically Handicapped/Mentally Retarded Persons
objectives: Provide financial assistance for self-employment
Support parents/mothers of physically/mentally disabled persons
eligibility_criteria: Parent/mother of physically handicapped or mentally retarded person

steps: Apply through Department of Social Justice

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: Persons With Disabilities Scheme In Colleges: Financial Assistance To Visually Challenged Teachers
social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.ministry: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment
social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.department: Department of Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities
objectives: Support visually challenged teachers in pursuing teaching and research
Provide financial assistance for readers and learning aids

benefits.learning_aids: Funds for Braille books and recorded materials

steps: Apply through educational institution or DEPwD

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: Farmer Suicide Ex-Gratia
objectives: Provide financial assistance to families of farmers who committed suicide
Support families affected by agrarian distress
eligibility_criteria: Family member of deceased farmer/tenant farmer

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: Rajasthan Chief Minister's Relief Fund - Accident Assistance
objectives: Provide financial assistance for accident victims
Support families in case of death or serious injury
eligibility_criteria: Victim of accident or their family

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: Supply of Prosthetic Appliances to Differently Abled Persons
objectives: Provide prosthetic appliances to differently-abled persons
Minimize mobility challenges
eligibility_criteria: Person with disability requiring prosthetic appliances

steps: Apply through Department of Social Welfare

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: National Award For Senior Citizens (Vayoshreshtha Samman): Best District Panchayat In Providing Services And Facilities To Senior Citizens
social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.ministry: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment
social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.department: Department of Social Justice and Empowerment
objectives: Recognize district Panchayats for outstanding work for senior citizens
Promote services and facilities for senior citizens

benefits.award: Recognition by the President of India on 1st October annually

eligibility_criteria: Demonstrated outstanding work for senior citizens

steps: Nominate through Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment
Submit details of senior citizen welfare activities

documents_required: Details of senior citizen welfare activities

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: Annai Teresa Ninaivu Marriage Assistance Scheme for Orphan Girls-II
social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.department: Social Welfare and Women Empowerment Department
objectives: Provide financial assistance for marriage of orphan girls
Support economically disadvantaged orphan brides
eligibility_criteria: Orphan girl aged 18 years or older

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: Petrol Subsidy To Persons With Disability
objectives: Provide petrol/diesel subsidy for persons with disabilities
Support mobility for handicapped individuals using motorized vehicles
eligibility_criteria: Person with disability using motorized vehicle

steps: Apply through Department of Social Welfare
Submit disability certificate and vehicle details

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: Shramyogi Home Town Scheme- Gujarat Labour Welfare Board
objectives: Facilitate railway fare payment for migrant labourers
Enable travel to/from home town for organized sector workers
eligibility_criteria: Migrant labourer in Gujarat’s organized sector
Registered with Gujarat Labour Welfare Board

steps: Apply through Gujarat Labour Welfare Board

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: Laptop Purchase Assistance Scheme- Gujarat Labour Welfare Board
objectives: Provide financial assistance for laptop purchase
Support children of laborers in professional/design courses
eligibility_criteria: Enrolled in professional or design course

steps: Apply through Gujarat Labour Welfare Board
Submit educational and labor registration documents

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: Thatched House Repair Grant for Re-thatching & Repairs (Sainik Welfare)
objectives: Provide grants for re-thatching and repair of houses
Support ex-servicemen, widows, or dependents

steps: Apply through Department of Sainik Welfare

social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.scheme_name: Financial Assistance Scheme for Purchase of Agricultural Land to Scheduled Caste Farmers
social_welfare_and_empowerment_schemes.department: Department of Social Justice and Empowerment
objectives: Provide financial assistance for purchasing agricultural land
Support Scheduled Caste farmers for self-cultivation

benefits.financial_assistance: Support for purchasing up to 2 acres of land

eligibility_criteria: Farmer intending to purchase agricultural land

steps: Apply through Department of Social Justice and Empowerment
